      • ai

        public boolean ai()
        Automatically makes a random move for the player
        Returns:
        boolean True if a move was successfully found, False otherwise (Should never be false)

      • takeTurn

        public boolean takeTurn(java.lang.String s)
        Executes or prevents each move a player tries to make by performing all checks necessary.
        Parameters:
        s - A String representing the move the current player is attempting to make
        Returns:
        boolean True if the move was successfully completed, False otherwise
